step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Holding the stretch well. Try to keep your elbows from drifting too far forward as you hold this position.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Continue to focus on keeping your wrists aligned and elbows close to your head.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straight and elbows close to your head as you move. This helps stretch your shoulders and chest effectively.
